overview:
Brendan is the CEO of NatureShare, an innovative social platform for the outdoor vertical and the leading publisher of mobile applications for nature and outdoor lifestyle.

He is a publishing industry veteran who began his career as a book editor working for Running Press, Grove/Atlantic, and Gotham Books (Penguin Group USA). He has also been a strategy consultant at the Boston Consulting Group, and was the founding publisher of Open Road Integrated Media, a venture capital-backed disruptive ebook startup. He has an undergraduate degree from the University of Pennsylvania and an MBA from the Wharton School, and is a member of the Board of Trustees of University of Pennsylvania Press.
